snippet: In the commune-esque home of the Italian designer and his wife, the artist Francis Upritchard, the colorful trappings of life and work are uniquely integrated.
abstract: Italian interior designer Martino Gamper takes inspiration from humble  and found materials, transforming them into exciting pieces of furniture.
lead_paragraph: In the commune-esque home of the Italian designer and his wife, the artist Francis Upritchard, the colorful trappings of life and work are uniquely integrated.

headline.main: At Home With Martino Gamper, Who Gives Unwanted Objects New Life as Furniture
